name: SKPaymentTransactionState
desc: Values representing the state of a transaction.

items.name: case purchasing
items.desc: A transaction that is being processed by the App Store.

items.name: case restored
items.desc: A transaction that restores content previously purchased by the user.

items.name: case deferred
items.desc: A transaction that is in the queue, but its final status is pending external action such as Ask to Buy.
